thread.section_title: Constant Contact Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Constant Contact | www.constantcontact.com
thread.title: Eliza Brown
thread.title_full: Constant Contact reviewed by Eliza Brown

author: Eliza Brown
title: Eliza Brown
text: The functionality is superb, making it easy--dare I say fun?--to design and send professional-looking newsletters. And the reporting function is a simple and useful tool for tracking our success. The only problem we have is that messages to about 6-10% of the addresses on our mailing list bounce back. For communications where we absolutely, positively have to reach everyone, we use another email platform.
